page.title: 13THE SCHOOL NURSE.
page.content: When we are at school, the nurse comes to visit us. She tests our eyes and looks at our teeth. She does not always do these things because she sometimes looks in our hair to see if there are any lice or nits in it. If there are she contacts our parents and gives them some ointment to wash our hair with. She told us she does not really like looking in our hair but she has to! She sometimes comes to test our hearing as well. Our school nurse does not only examine us. She tells us what to eat to keep healthy. She tells us to serve food, not germs. The school nurse helps those who have problems to cope with their illness in school. These children might have diabetes or asthma or something like that. She brings us posters to remind us what to do to stay fit and healthy. Our school nurse is very nice.
